key.name: run-in-background
key.summary: Keep running in the background when closed.
key.description: Whether or not to keep running when pressing the closed button. This provides the fastest lookups when using keyboard shortcuts.

key.name: load-from-clipboard
key.description: Whether or not to replace the search text with the current clipboard contents. This is needed for automatic lookups with keyboard shortcuts.

key.name: show-welcome
key.summary: Show or hide the welcome screen.
key.description: Whether or not to show or hide the welcome screen.

key.name: first-launch
key.summary: Whether this is the first time the app runs.
key.description: Whether or not this is the first time the app has been run on a given system. Can be reset to true to restore a more default state.
